Items.text: This is going to be your science class for the year.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: You'll be solving puzzles, doing experiments, and finding out exactly how your powers work.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: Remember, your powers aren't magic, they're science!
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: However, we don't have much going on today.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: The principal and staff are having an assembly for all of the students on the first day.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: So, if you could all make your way to the gymnasium, and I will see you in class tomorrow.
Items.name: Ms Sparks
